long_description: Sleek, light and surprisingly warm, the women's Patagonia Nano Puff Pullover is made from warm, incredibly lightweight, highly compressible PrimaLoft(R) One synthetic insulation. Wear it as a pullover in cool, dry weather, or as an insulating layer beneath a shell jacket when it's cold and wet out. Nano blocks wind, sheds snow and traps heat, even when wet; 60g PrimaLoft One is incredibly warm, low-bulk, compressible and hydrophobic. Deep-venting half-zip has a soft, wicking interior stormflap and zipper garage. Recycled ripstop polyester glides effortlessly when worn with other layers; Durable Water Repellent finish fends off light rain showers and snow. Classic brick quilting pattern through the torso and waist with narrow horizontal quilting at the side panels adds shape; burly thread adds durability. Packs down to practically nothing and stuffs into the single chest pocket that has a carabiner clip-in loop. Elasticized cuffs and hem seal out wind and trap warmth. The women's Patagonia Nano Puff pullover has a regular fit.
short_description: Sleek, light and surprisingly warm, the women's Patagonia Nano Puff Pullover is made from warm, incredibly lightweight, highly compressible PrimaLoft(R) One synthetic insulation.
